name: dissociable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be considered as separate and not related: dissociable from The study reported that the genetic influences evident in early childhood were dissociable from those seen in adolescence. Although genetic and environmental influences are dissociable, disambiguating them can be extremely difficult.
More examplesFewer examplesWords and gestures, while coordinated early in development, follow dissociable paths over time.ADHD is characterized by dissociable cognitive and behavioural profiles.This finding implies that inner speech and speech production are dissociable, even though they share similar networks.
